DOC.detailed_description: A total 50 patient enrol double-blinded , randomize , control trial . Inclusion criterion : subject > 40 yrs age expect hospital stay Medical Intensive Care Regional Heart Unit LVH Muhlenberg 6 day longer ( 4 day bedridden ) enrol . Total drug treatment 6-14 day hospital . A follow phone call perform study team approximately 30 day hospital discharge . Primary endpoint : bleeding rate ( minor v major ) study day 1-14 . Secondary endpoint : DVT study day 1-14 ( confirm LE duplex ultrasonogram ) .
